title: 007: Tomorrow Never Dies
description: Tomorrow Never Dies is a shooting action video game inspired by the classic sci-fi movie of the same name. The game is considered the first game about the famous 007 spy character and was released by Electronic Arts and MGM Interactive in 1999. Although it has been nearly two decades, the game still has many attractions for players on how to play and plot. The story tells the journey of performing the missions of super-spy James Bond. He was sent to regions around the world such as Russia, China, Japan, even Vietnam. Each mission thing must confront the dangers. But with intelligence, agent 007 has completed the mission, destroying many large-scale conspiracies around the world. In the game, players will be immersed in super spies. The game only has a single-player mode, and the player seeks to complete the assigned tasks. In addition to the main character, players can use another character named Wai-Lin when reaching a certain level. The game is divided into several levels and the world. Each world will have goals for players to complete. The number of enemies in each world is also quite large with a boss at the end. Your main weapon will be a gun with a limited number of bullets. Players can equip blood boxes to restore health by picking up on the road or buying with money earned. As a game was born quite a long time, the simple graphics when using 2D images mainly.

title: A1 Racing
description: Racing as the title suggests is a simple racing game. It features both a short and a long distance race course, a mirrored version of the long course, plus different skill levels. Before a race begins, players select a car (out of 6 total), and then set whether they want automatic or manual transmission, and whether they want a drift or grip setting. Races have the player racing against 3 opponent racers. Players try to attain the fastest lap times and the fastest total race time while trying to defeat their opponents. The players fastest times can then be saved. The game also contains a brief tutorial that explains the controls and some techniques of racing.

The game features lovely characters and colorful, designed worlds.

title: Clock Tower
description: With the survival challenge, Clock Tower 1996 will provide a mouse cursor on the screen, and the player will use this mouse pointer to interact with the surroundings. The player’s main task is to escape from the pursuit of Scissorman, the game’s antagonist. Also, there will be two main cores for players to use are Jennifer Simpson and Helen Maxwell. From providing these two characters, the producer brings five different endings at the end of the game. Depending on the actions and choices of the player when performing a survival mission. People will explore the game in different stages, and the character’s health status is displayed in three separate colours with the mouse pointer. When the mouse pointer shows white, the character’s health is stable and can quickly interact with surrounding objects to find a way to survive. The case of the mouse pointer is shown in yellow, meaning the character has been subjected to an attack from Scissorman, and the health condition will be impaired. That makes players interact with objects or structures around them more slowly. Finally, the mouse pointer is red, the state of the character is in a chaotic state and easily killed by Scissorman.

title: Colony Wars
description: Colony Wars is an action game released and developed by Psygnosis Entertainment. The story begins when the solar system is exhausted by natural resources. For this reason, the Earth has sent uncrewed spacecraft to travel to distant planets and to find resources. After finding resources, the Earth people sent people to colonial planets to exploit. The inhabitants of the colonial planets are dissatisfied with most of their resources being exploited to serve the Earth. That was the cause of an uprising on a colonial planet, resulting in the planet being destroyed by the Earth. After that, the colonial planets worked together to fight for peace with the leader; Father leads the fight. At the beginning of the game, your attack ability will be quite weak, although the bullets fired are continuous. However, you can upgrade your weapons by picking up items shaped like bullets that fall off after destroying enemies. When you collect these items of the same type, you will double the number of rays. If you let the spaceship be destroyed, the effects of weapons will be lost. Besides, enemies also drop items that have different effects after being destroyed.

title: Crash Bandicoot
description: Crash Bandicoot is an action game developed by Naughty Dog. In 1996, Sony Computer Entertainment released the game on the PlayStation in North America. The game’s plot takes place in an archipelago in southeast Australia. This is where Dr. Neo Cortex and his assistant Dr. Nitrus Brio created a horrific experiment. They used a device called Evolvo-Ray to work on the different animals living on the island to turn them into beasts with superpowers to serve them. The crash was originally a gentle Bandicoot mouse but was captured by Vortex to test him to become the leader of the entire army created from this experiment. Two people will think Crash will obey, the experiment has turned him into a mighty and out of control animal. After trying to control Crash but without success, Cortex decided to release Crash. After Crash left, Cortex continued to prepare experiments on a Bandicoot mouse named Tawna. During their time in custody, Crash and Tawna became good friends. Crash decides to go back and defeat Professor Cortex to save his best friend.

title: Crash Bandicoot 2 – Cortex Strikes Back
description: Crash Bandicoot 2 is a sequel to the Crash Bandicoot Series developed by Naughty Dog. In 1997, Sony Computer Entertainment released the game on the PlayStation in North America. Following the success of its predecessor, the story of Crash Bandicoot 2: Cortex Strikes Back is the process of revenge by Dr. Cortex Vortex. After falling from the balloon, Dr. Cortex not only did not die but also accidentally fell into a cave filled with glowing crystals. He took a few samples and then found a way to return to one of his labs for research in search of another great source of power. Cortex immediately found a new assistant, Dr. N. Gin, and rebuilt the upgraded Cortex Vortex lab a year later with crystal-powered materials in outer space. Unfortunately, the number of crystals that Dr. Cortex brought back was not enough, he needed at least 25 more. Cortex had to devise a conspiracy to find ways to use Crash to force him to go get more crystals back for him. Crash quickly caught and was caught. When he wakes up, he talks to Cortex’s hologram. He continued to seduce Crash by telling him that he had discovered crystal energies that could destroy the world and urged Crash to quickly bring more crystals for him to study. Later Dr. Nitrus Brio also appears as a hologram but is no longer Cortex’s assistant but Crash’s ally. He told Crash his plan to fight Cortex. On his journey, Crash met up with some of the Cortex’s old henchmen, Ripper Roo, wielding Komodo Brothers and Tiny Tiger.

title: Crash Bash
description: Crash Bash is the first part of Crash Boom Bang! This series is also the last game series released for Playstation. With a simple story, players will train an animal and take them to the competition. When entering the game, there will be a list of many creatures appear for the player to choose. These animals are designed very lovely, eye-catching colors should be loved by players. The summoned beasts in the game will be divided into four systems with different powers. The first is the fire system, the summoned beasts of the fire system will favor strong attacks with the ability to kill the opponent immediately. The second is the earth system, the summoned beasts of the earth system will be more resistant, they will have a lot more blood and armor. The third is the water system, these creatures will have an amazing ability to recover, they will have the ability to restore blood and energy for themselves when fighting. And finally will be the lightning element, the beasts of this system will have a formidable speed, they have the ability to attack and move in the blink of an eye, making the opponent extremely surprised. The choice of which animal system will depend on their preferences and play. But there will be notes for the player, the fire system animals will be countered by the water system animals, similarly, the animals in the earth system will be countered by those in the clay system. Therefore, players should consider and choose the most appropriate creatures.

title: Diablo
description: Diablo is an action role-playing game first released by Blizzard Entertainment on January 5, 1997. The context of the game is the fictional kingdom of Khanduras with rebellion taking place everywhere. The story revolves around the main character named Lord of Terror, he is a lone hero of the kingdom and also the one who fought to free Khanduras from rebellions. Behind the kingdom’s underground is the town of Tristram, which is also the base for the rebels. Your journey in the game will be associated with this town, and you will have to pass 16 dungeon maps to face the last boss of the game, Diablo. When starting the game, the system will ask you to create a new character. The game consists of three character classes are Warrior, rogue, and mage. Each class has its attributes with different fighting styles and a unique skill. The warrior class has the greatest physical strength with high hit resistance and a strong melee attack. Besides, the rogue class is a master of ranged combat. Although not as strong in close combat, enemies will be hard to reach to attack with this class. Meanwhile, the magician class is the weakest physical strength among the three classes. However, this class can learn many high-level spells with tremendous damage and abundant energy.

When coming to this island, a character named Jijimon will appear and greet the player’s character. His job is to go around the island and identify the Digimon creatures in File City. The task of the player is to train one of his Digimon and fight all the other Digimon on this island. After defeating the Digimon, players will move to Infinity Mountain to fight the final bosses including Analogman and mega Machinedramon. After defeating Digimon of these last two bosses, players will win and successfully rescue that Island.

title: Dino Crisis
description: Dino Crisis is a survival horror game released for the PlayStation in 1999 by Capcom. The game revolves around the main character named Regina. He was an agent in an organization sent by the US government to a deserted island to investigate a research facility on it. Upon reaching the island, the organization discovered that the place was flooded with dinosaurs; they appeared everywhere. Our protagonist must group around the island to find a base to uncover secrets and will have to escape the bloodthirsty dinosaurs on the island. The basic abilities of a character include walking, running, pushing or moving objects, and climbing on them. On the screen, there will be a map showing the position of the player, destination, save point, and wing positions of each room’s locked in the base. The save points in each room are points to the next level and also the task of the player throughout the game. The player can open the locked doors by inserting the digital locking discs into the door. These disks decode and unlock the door. Also, there is a red laser beam system. When activated this system, will protect you from ferocious dinosaurs.

title: Dino Crisis 2

In this version, the game focuses on the battles between the US military against the sabotage of the tyrant dinosaurs. The player controls a dinosaur hunter with positioning devices. They use primary and secondary weapons to defeat the enemy. Some of the primary threats are rifles, flamethrowers, and shotguns. These guns create significant damage to the enemy to help players quickly destroy the enemy. Also, auxiliary weapons such as knives, smoke bombs, and grenades are used to surprise enemies. For each defeated dinosaur, the player receives extinction points. This point is considered as a particular currency for buying in-store items. The fully equipped things bring high power and ensure safety for players. Besides destroying dinosaurs, players will destroy many buildings to receive additional bonus points. After completing the main task, players experience the extended survival mode. This mode brings many unique and exciting challenges for them.

description: Fear Effect 2: Retro Helix is a fantasy action-adventure game developed by Kronos Digital Entertainment. Eidos Interactive released the game on the PlayStation platform in 2001. Regarding the plot, the game is set in Hong Kong in 2048, with the incident of missing the tomb of the first emperor. Players begin the journey to the city of Xi’an, where many bandits appear to search for clues. With gameplay similar to the first version, players are equipped with rifles weapons and some special weapons to facilitate melee. They were brought to the city by submarine and infiltrated the center through the secret tunnel. After exiting the tunnel, the player defeats an enemy in the way to gain information on their computer. However, they will die if attacked by many enemies and must restart the mission. The success of the battle will take players to the control room of the dark organization. Here, they find a map to where the ancient tomb is kept. The mission is completed when the player and his teammates find the old tomb and bring the offender facing a strict sentence. title: Fighting Force
description:
Fighting Force players control one of four characters. They move through urban and science fiction environments, battling waves of oncoming enemies with weapons ranging from fists and bottles to knives, chairs and guns. The player can make some choices as to which territory to travel through.

The four characters have various reasons for taking on Dr. Zeng, a criminal mastermind with an army at his command. The action starts with a police cordon around Zeng's office skyscraper, moving to such locales as a shopping mall, subway and Coast Guard base before finally ending at the top of Zeng's island headquarters.

title: Final Fantasy IX
description: Final Fantasy IX is a role-playing game released by the PlayStation in 2000. The game focuses on an ancient fantasy world called Gaia. The plot revolves around the aftermath of territorial battles between nations in this world. In Alexandria, the nation’s princess has been kidnapped by a bandit from the Zidane tribe. It was like a challenge from neighboring country Lindblum. This bandit has teamed up with Garnet and other villains with the goal of overthrowing the reign of Queen Brahne in the kingdom of Alexandria. After a few levels, players will receive information that the overthrow of Queen Brahne is just an excuse for a much larger threat. This threat will be able to destroy their world.

title: Final Fantasy VI
description: Final Fantasy VI is a role-playing action game released by PlayStation in 1994 with many differences from previous versions. The Palamecian Empire wanted to rule the world with the use of dark forces. The game supports up to four players to participate in the quest to destroy the Palamecian empire. In single-player mode, players will choose an existing character is Firion and accompany Maria, Guy, and Leon to start their journey. The four-player mode will help players complete tasks faster. Each character possesses a skill set with different powers. Firion and Maria are two archers with the main weapon being a bow with an infinite number of bows and arrows. Guy, with the ability to communicate with animals, will make the journey to find the Palamecian empire easier. Firion’s last companion is Leon, a black-clad knight with stealth skills. Leon accompanies Firion in the first phase but is later captured and captured by Palamecian soldiers.

title: Final Fantasy VII
description: Final Fantasy VII is an action role-playing game released in 1997 by Square. The game revolves around a mercenary named Cloud Strife belonging to a terrorist suppression organization on a planet named Planet. The life of this planet depends on a source of energy that gives life to everything. That power is known as the Lifestream. A Shinra power company is working to drain the Lifestream energy source for a dark purpose. This company belongs to the Megacorpination group that dominates the planet and is based in the city of Midgar. Shinra’s actions are weakening the planet and threatening the existence of all living things. To prevent this danger, an organization called Soldier was created. This organization trains the best soldiers to perform the mission to protect the planet. They have chosen the best soldier, Cloud Strife, to accomplish the goal. In the game, the player plays the role of Cloud Strife to help him complete his mission.

title: Final Fantasy VIII
description: Final Fantasy VIII is a role-playing action game released by PlayStation in 1999 with many differences from previous versions. The game is the eighth installment in the Final Fantasy series, taking place from a bogus fantasy world with elements of science fiction. The game centers around a protagonist named Squall Leonhart, who, along with his friends, is drawn into a conflict with the evil sorceress from the future called Ultimecia. To defeat Ultimecia, Squall Leonhart and his friends will have to go through a lot of hardships and challenges. In this version, players will feel the game in the most honest way. The scenes in the game, vividly simulated and quite similar to real-life locations. The characters in the game, designed with eye-catching looks with colorful costumes. The game will also run smoothly, after a lot of editing and learning from previous versions.

title: G-Police
description:
After a violent interstellar resource war, mega-corporations seize power from the remnants of Earth's governments and lead humanity's way into the colonization of space. The last vestige of central authority is in the form of the G-Police (Government Police); an independent agency tasked with keeping order in the colonies. You play as rookie Jeff Slater – a former military pilot going undercover at the G-Police squadron on Callisto, in the hopes of finding the truth behind your sister's sudden death.

G-Police is an arcade-style helicopter shooter set inside the colony domes on Callisto. You pilot a futuristic close-air-support gunship, and are tasked with engaging ground and air enemies as you uncover a sinister corporate plot. Your ship can hover and turn in a VTOL mode, fire weapons outfitted before each mission, and lock on to objects in the world to both track enemies and scan suspicious cargo. Missions require you to navigate through the skyscrapers and billboards of the various city districts, and complete a number of objectives updated through radio contact with headquarters.

title: Grand Theft Auto
description: Grand Theft Auto is an adventure action game released by BMG Interactive for PlayStation in 1998. The game is set in three major US cities: New York City, Miami City, and San Francisco. All three cities are full of dangers and crimes. Local officials are corrupt, organized theft and brawls between gangs are everywhere. There are 6 stages in the game and divided equally among 3 cities. Each stage is divided into levels with increasing difficulty. The goal of each stage is to reach the required number of points. These scores are usually achieved by completing the missions given by the criminal organizations corresponding to a level.

title: Grand Theft Auto 2
description: Grand Theft Auto 2 is an overhead viewing role-playing game released by Rockstar Games in 1999. It is also the second version of the Grand Theft Auto Series with more new features than its predecessor and has a whole new storyline. Join the game, you will control a character. He is a Mafia and performs many different tasks for gangs in the city like looting, stealing, murder, smuggling … Each mission will require players to complete in a period of time. Completing the way this mission will bring you bonuses and new weapons. With the new weapons, you can complete more difficult tasks easily. Besides, players can also use the bonus to buy new weapons or bullets. As a role-playing game with FreeStyle, you can also control your character moving around the city and explore every area. A number of hidden quests will be displayed for players to join. In particular, Kill Frenzy is the most interesting hidden task and is loved by many players. This mission will be triggered when the player collects a new gun or a vehicle appears on the street. In a short amount of time, you need to kill many people or police on the street to complete the mission. The more people you kill, the greater the reward you will receive. This is the easiest way for you to collect bonuses and become stronger.

title: Grandia
description: The ancient Angelou civilization has ceased to exist centuries ago, and technology in the world develops rapidly. General Baal, the head of the militaristic Garlyle Forces, organizes an excavation of ancient ruins, apparently for philanthropic reasons. Meanwhile, Justin, a young boy from the nearby town of Parm, decides to investigate the ruins in search of the Spirit Stone, an artefact that once belonged to his missing father. A mysterious holographic image tells him that he should travel to faraway lands to discover the stone’s true power, and he embarks on the most dangerous adventure of his life without hesitation. Grandia is a Japanese-style role-playing game. The characters are represented by 2D sprites which are moved around over 3D backgrounds in towns and dungeons. The game makes use of anime-style cutscenes to advance the story. Combat is initiated by coming into contact with enemies on the screen, rather than through random battles. Battles occur in pseudo-real-time, using an ‘IP Gauge’ to determine when a character takes action. Striking at the right time or with the right ability can even delay or cancel an enemy’s turn.

Harvest Moon – Back to Nature
description: Harvest Moon: Back to Nature is a live-action simulation game produced by Victor Interactive Software and released on Playstation in 1999. Set in the same context as farm management games, spin games around the main character named by the player. The story is about a boy with a passion for agriculture since childhood. It was mostly inspired by the boy’s grandfather, who was always busy taking care of the farm rather than spending time with the boy. However, because he lived in the city from a young age, the boy had to explore his town on his own with his grandfather’s only friend, the dog. Later, the boy met a girl his age and made friends with her, and the two became increasingly close. When the summer was over, he had to return to escape the bustling city, but he promised his best friend that he would return someday. Ten years later, the boy became a grown man every year. He decided to go back to town to take care of his farm because his grandfather was gone. However, the farm was abandoned for too long, all the plants were withered, and the people here abandoned it. They gave him a chance to restore the land for a period of five. If that fails, he will be forced to leave.

title: Heart of Darkness
description: Heart of Darkness is an adventure action game inspired by the movie of the same name. The game was released for the PlayStation in 2001 by Interplay Productions. The game revolves around a boy named Andy, who is revealed by his homeroom teacher to be afraid of the dark. The teacher taught Andy some magic, and he used it to bring his uncle Whiskey to the magic park. In this place, his dog has been kidnapped by a dark force. To find and retrieve his beloved dog, he invented the machinery; After that, the boy went to another world called Darkland by spaceship. Immediately the ship malfunction, and he will face many pitfalls and enemies. Andy will have to fight the enemy to rescue the dog and return home before it’s too late. The game consists of several stages, and each stage has many levels with increasing difficulty. At the end of each stage, the player will have to destroy one of Hades’s strongest minions. When destroying enemies, they can drop items such as weapons, potion, hearts …These items have a higher drop rate when you kill the boss. Characters will lose their lives if their character’s HP is depleted.
publisher: Infogrames Multimedia, Interplay Productions, Ocean Software

title: Hugo
description:
Hugo, the well known European TV troll makes his appearance on PlayStation.

Once upon a time, there was a troll family living in a forest. They were living happily in the forest, but little did they know about the danger looming nearby. Over in a short distance is a mountain on top of which is a skull-shaped cavern. This cave is a home to an evil witch Scylla, the villain of this game.

One day, Hugo's three kids and his wife Hugolina, were playing outside their house. That's when Scylla made her move and ambushed the troll kids. Hugolina heard this and ran outside only to be kidnapped along with the children. At the same time, Hugo was having a nap, only to awaken quickly to see what's happening outside. Sadly, he was too late and the witch was already heading back to home with Hugolina and the kids. Hugo immediately went after the witch to save his family…

title: Jackie Chan Stuntmaster
description: Jackie Chan Stuntmaster is an adventure action game developed and published by Radical Entertainment for PlayStation in 2000. The game is inspired by the real character Jackie Chan – a famous martial arts actor in Hong Kong. According to the game’s story, a bunch of mysterious people kidnapped Jackie Chan’s grandfather and they went to New York City. After learning the news, Jackie Chan went to New York City to rescue his grandfather and investigate the mystery surrounding these kidnappers. In New York City, Jackie Chan will face different challenges to rescue his grandfather. The game consists of 15 levels with increasing difficulty that players need to overcome. Players will also experience many parts of New York City including: waterfront, sewers, roofs, factories and streets. At the end of each level, the player will have to fight a boss. To reach the next level, players will have to defeat this boss.

title: Klonoa: Door to Phantomile
description:
Klonoa: Door to Phantomile is a role-playing action game released by Namco in 1997.
You will play a character named Klonoa with the magic ring to save the world from the attack of evil dark souls. The game context is quite familiar as players will fight in a 2D plane. Here, you can only move left, right, jump, or fly a short distance. By using their rings, players can grab monsters and inflate them. You can then throw it to destroy other enemies or use them to overcome obstacles along the way. The challenge system of the game is divided into stages with increasing difficulty. In each stage, you must confront a Boss to obtain the key that opens the door to the next area. To win, players need to quickly find a weak point and have a reasonable strategy to destroy it before your character is defeated.
Klonoa: Door to Phantomile has classic graphics. The effects are very interesting and varied, along with images of cute cartoon characters that make for a fascinating game.

title: Legacy Of Kain: Soul Reaver
description: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver is an adventure action game released by Eidos Interactive for PlayStation in 1999. Join the game, and the player will act as a horror vampire named Raziel. With the help of wings, he can fly into the air by holding the jump button on the control panel. If you want the character to fly down, take your finger off the jump button. One of the main and best abilities of a character is clinging to walls to be able to climb. However, the character’s speed when climbing will be slower than normal movement. Raziel will shoot out magic bullets to destroy enemies and to defend himself. When starting the game, the character’s attack ability is quite weak. To increase the ability to attack, you will pick up items dropped after destroying monsters. When killing all monsters at each level, a boss will appear. You will have to defeat this boss if you want to explore the next level. When flying, you will have a period allowed. When you fly beyond this time, the character will automatically fall after being exhausted. You can reset Raziel’s fitness when he is on the ground after a while. There are pitfalls along the way, and you will need to avoid them if you don’t want to lose your character’s life.

title: Legend
description:
Legend is a 3D Beat-em-up game released on the Sony Playstation in 1998. It is a remake of the Super Nintendo game of the same name, Legend. It was developed by Toka, which included the same two key members who created the original Legend, Carlo Perconti and Lyes Belaidouni. 

STORY: 
There is chaos and despair in the kingdom of Tovakia. The King's felonious brother has been exiled to live as an outlaw in the outer rims of the world after several violent attempts of assassinating the King and take over the throne. Saturated with hate and greed the brother will not remain in oblivion for long. He attends a Dark Sorcerer to learn the powers of evil and black magic. The King shall not feel safe for long. 

After years of studies the evil brother himself becomes a Dark Sorceror and is ready to stand up against his brother which he hates with all of his cold heart. But he can not do it alone. He needs an army, a force of warriors to break through the defences of his brother. He therefore turns to Morlock the Soulthief for help and support. The evil demons agrees to the vicious schemes of the King's brother under one circumstance: All souls in the kingdom will for eternity belong to Morlock for his personal satisfaction. Being so Morlock and the evil brother become allies. Allies in blood. Already an evil and sinister plan was forming in the heads of the rulers of darkness. 

Later in the castle of the King the loyal life guards Axel, Tara and Karo stand guard in front of the door to the throne room. Suddenly they hear a deafening noise and the King's cry for help. Swiftly they turn around and knock the door open with their weapons just in time to see a hideous gargoyle standing with the King in its arms. As Axel moves forward to stop the gargoyle two monsters step out of the dark and attack the fearless trio. In the meantime the gargoyle gets away with the motionless body of the King. After a short bloody battle Axel, Tara and Karo are standing alone in the throne room of the King looking out of the scattered window where they can see the shape of the gargoyle vanishing in the horizon. 

Dark times are coming and Axel, Tara and Karo prepare themselves for a quest. The quest to find the King and to destroy the evil alliance of the felonious brother and Morlock the Soulthief. 

CHARACTERS: 
* Axel: The average all-around character. Good with every weapon. 
* Tara: A fast character. Good with light weapons. 
* Karo: A strong but slow character. Good with heavy weapons. 

WEAPONS: 
* Sword 
* Long Sword 
* Double Sword 
* Knives Stick 
* Heavy Axe 
* Crossbow 
* Cannon 
* Magic Gauntlets 

STAGES: 
* Stage 1: Dark Forest 
* Stage 2: The City 
* Stage 3: Arena 
* Stage 4: Evil Church 
* Stage 5: Dark Fortress 

FEATURES: 
* Side-scrolling hack and slash 'em-up 
* Amazing graphics with multiple characters on screen at once 
* Huge range of monsters from gargoyles to a giant dragon 
* Instinctive controls and non-stop action 

Manufacturer's description: 

Let the legend begin. 
The King has been kidnapped by Morlock the Soulthief an ally of the King's evil brother.You have to control the King's lifeguards Axel,Kara and Tano in an attempt to rescue the King from the clutches of evil and restore peace and order to the Kingdom of Tokavia.

title: Lunar 2 Eternal Blue Complete
description: Lunar 2: Eternal Blue is an RPG with a familiar turn-based style. Fans of this game are numerous and they are always waiting for the next version. However, an unexpected event occurred. Lunar 2: Eternal Blue Complete is a remake of Lunar 2: Eternal Blue was released in 1999. Of course, this version has many significant changes in graphics and gameplay to satisfy players. A lot of bugs have been removed and help people get the best experience. Some details about the game’s story have been modified to avoid making players bored. After the silver star event, Hiro, a talented explorer, meets Lucia, a girl from the blue star. She is doing a very difficult task of stopping the plan of Zophar – a dangerous creature that possesses many types of power. Zophar wants to destroy life at the Blue star to increase his power. You will have to help these two characters in their mission to stop evil and protect Blue Star.

title: Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes
description: Marvel vs. Capcom is a collection of action games inspired by Marvel comics. The game was first released on May 19, 1996, by Capcom and Backbone Entertainment. Join the game; players will act as superheroes of the Marvel universe and perform the tasks of each character you choose. In battles, players will use flexible moves and use special attacks to attack enemies. The control of characters to create flexible moves requires players to perform many different movements. You will win when the opponent’s vitality bar runs out. Also, there is another way to win the match. It is more your health bar than the opponents at the end of the time of a match. Also, you can select multiple characters to form a team of up to three people. In a team match, players can freely exchange between characters at any time. Also, the game has a feature that replays the action when you weaken the opponent. The game will play a slow video showing your attack, causing the player to be defeated or lose a large amount of hp.

title: Medal of Honor
description: Medal of Honor is a shooting role-playing game developed by DreamWorks Interactive and released in 1999. This is the first version in the Medal of Honor series, it is also a solid platform for developers to make The next version in the most perfect way. The game centers around the main character, Lieutenant Jimmy Patterson, a notorious sniper gunman in the United States air transport command. Jimmy Patterson is a well-known gunman with excellent sniping ability, he can take down targets from unbelievable distances. This time, Jimmy Patterson’s mission is to defeat the boss of a bandit that has caused a lot of crimes in New York City, along with rescuing an American citizen hostage. That boss is also a man who used to work for the US military so his abilities cannot be underestimated. Besides Jimmy Patterson, there will be good teammates to help him by delivering important news.

title: MediEvil 2
description: MediEvil 2 is an action-adventure game that is part of the MediEvil game series developed by SCE Cambridge Studio and officially launched on the PlayStation version in 2000. Regarding the plot, the events in MediEvil 2 will follow the battles with monsters from the previous version. Players will control Sir Daniel Fortesque to explore dangerous caves once again to defeat the witch Zarok. After a decisive battle two years ago, Zarok’s power gradually recovered, and it created a powerful army and many magic books. With weapons and guns and swords, the player must destroy monsters in the way to collect weapons, information leading to Zarok’s hiding place. When gathering enough experience points, Daniel’s level will increase synonymous with his strength growing. However, he will die and lose a lot of experience points if he falls into the trap of the enemy. After a long time exploring the mysterious cave, Daniel finds the room containing Zarok and its magic books. The final battle between him and Zarok takes place in the dark area. Successfully destroying Zarok and destroying their cave will take Daniel to the special area to receive the reward and end the game.

title: Medievil
description:
MediEvil is an action-adventure game released in 1998 by Sony Computer Entertainment released in 1998. In 1286, according to the game’s story, an evil witch named Zarok plotted to usurp the king. Gallow National 4.0.3. He built an undead army to invade the kingdom. According to legend, King Gallow ordered General Daniel Fortesque against Zaro’s army. Daniel Fortesque won the battle after defeating Zarok before he died. However, the truth is that Daneil Fortesque was shot down by an arrow in battle. To protect the honor of Daniel Fortesque, the king concealed the truth and declared him a hero in battle and also a hero of the kingdom of Gallow 4.0.3. Meanwhile, despite failing, Zarock is still alive and escaping. After a hundred years from the end of the battle, the evil witch Zarock has reappeared. He used a spell to drown the entire Gallow Kingdom of 4.0.3 into eternal darkness. He then used magic to revive his army to invade the kingdom once more. He used the soul of the living to bring in the dead to revive the army. However, in the process of reviving his army, he accidentally revived Daniel Fortesque. Daniel Fortesque then took this opportunity to truly defeat Zarock and save the kingdom.
Players will play the corpse of Daniel Fortesque to join the game. You will fight the monsters created by Zarock and come to his lair. After defeating a number of bosses defending Zarock, the player will fight him directly. After defeating him, his magic will be ineffective. The souls of the living returned to their original places, the corpses returned to the surface, and the game ended here.

title: Metal Gear Solid
description: Metal Gear Solid is an action game released in 1998 by Konami. The game revolves around a soldier named Solid Snake. His mission is to infiltrate FOXHOUND’s nuclear weapons production base – a terrorist force to neutralize nuclear weapons. This will help the world to avoid a terrorist threat on a large scale.

title: Mortal Kombat 4
description: After the great success of Mortal Kombat 3 in 1997, Mortal Kombat 4 was released. The game retains the role-playing game action. In this version of Mortal Kombat 4, there have been significant improvements compared to the previous Mortal Kombat versions, because this is one of the first games to use 3D technology. The battle locations in the game have been upgraded quite a lot, and the publisher has also added many new locations.

title: Mortal Kombat Trilogy
description: After the great success of the Mortal Kombat series in 1997, Mortal Kombat Trilogy was released the following year. The game retains the role-playing game action. However, in this Mortal Kombat Trilogy version, there have been significant improvements compared to the previous Mortal Kombat versions, one of which is the improvement of the game’s 3D graphics. The battle locations in the game have been upgraded quite a lot, and the publisher has also added many new locations. To prevent the game from being repeated and the player not feeling bored. Most of the main characters in the game are the same as the previous version and have been added by the publishers to twenty people.

title: Myst
description: A book written by a potentially paranoid man named Atrus serves as a portal to an otherworldly place, the island of Myst, in this atmospheric adventure game by developer Cyan. Forgoing the character interaction and inventory-based puzzles found in earlier computer adventure games, Myst places you in a lonely, desolate environment with no obvious indication on where you should go or what you are supposed to do. By exploring the island, you will eventually stumble upon an assortment of puzzles in the form of intricate contraptions, whose secrets can only be unlocked after discovering evidence of their nature. As you progress in the game, you will find four other books written by Atrus that magically transport you to additional worlds, each offering more interconnected puzzles and clues to the storyline. Myst's look is noteworthy for featuring still images viewed from a first-person perspective, with interaction limited to manipulating a cursor over each static picture.

title: Need for Speed III: Hot Pursuit
Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus
description: Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus is a 2D platform game very similar to its predecessor both visually and gameplay-wise. Like in the previous game, Abe has to outsmart his foes and avoid obstacles rather than confront them directly. The game is larger than its predecessor and is more oriented towards puzzle-solving, featuring more complex interaction with the Mudokons, who can now be angry, wired, depressed, sick, or blind. The first three problematic conditions can be removed with the appropriate "Gamespeak" command; sick Mudokons must be cured with a special item, while blind ones will follow Abe's voice and may fall to their deaths if Abe doesn't stop them in time.

title: Oddworld: Abe’s Oddysee
description: Oddworld: Abe’s Exoddus is a platform game, and this is the sequel to Oddworld: Abe of Oddysee. The game was developed by Oddworld Inhabitants and released by GT Interactive on October 12, 2009. Following the story from the previous game, Abe continues his journey to rescue his fellow Mudokons. After investigating, he discovered his friend was slavery at a beverage production area called Mudokons. At this place, they have made a drink that uses human bones and tears to make materials, and this drink is known as Soulstorm. Participating in the game, the player will play the role of Abe, the player will have to complete the task of rescuing Abe’s friend and stop the production of drinks. The space of the game includes the screen. As the player moves, the display will change accordingly. Players will encounter puzzles on the move, and they are by using the special abilities of the protagonist such as activating mines, neutralising mines, pushing stones …The mechanical movements of a character include walking, running, jumping and crouching. All of these capabilities work in certain cases.

title: One
description:
The unwitting recipient of a destructive prosthesis — a powerful blaster grafted onto his left arm — John Cain awakes to find himself being hunted down by a military organization, with no recollection of the events leading to this predicament. Inspired by Contra and other such titles, One is a pseudo-3D scrolling shooter in which players find themselves traversing a variety of locales, from futuristic Blade Runner-esque cities to remote mountainous regions, all in search of answers. The central gameplay mechanic is the player's Rage meter. Simply put, John Cain is fueled by rage. By destroying objects, killing people, and generally causing all kinds of wanton mayhem, he will increase in power. Cain's rage is represented by an orb-like indicator that undergoes a number of color changes, from the relative calm of green to an infuriated red, and beyond.

The higher the color, the more damage the character can sustain and, as an added bonus, the damage yield of the arm blaster is increased as well. Eventually the protagonist will be capable of unleashing a mighty special attack. Taking too much damage however, will cause the meter to revert to a lower state. Though his primary means of attack is his newfound appendage, John Cain is capable of executing melee attacks as well. He can also perform a handful of evasive maneuvers, such as rolling, strafing and even a double jump, which must be mastered in order to traverse the many platforms and pitfalls that await in the title's eight missions. Restart points are scattered throughout the stages and players can save their progress at the conclusion of each level.

title: PaRappa the Rapper
description:
PaRappa Rapper is a fairly famous animated film, the protagonist of the film is a dog Rap named PaRappa like a paper. Rap wants to attract the attention of Sunny Funny – a beautiful girl. However, he doesn’t know how to attract Sunny Funny. One day, Joe Chin is a wealthy dog ​​trying to reach Sunny Funny. To compete with Joe Chin, PaRappa joined a dojo in the city and tried to become a martial artist. While going to the market to buy a birthday present for Sunny PaRappa caused a traffic accident and had to pay a lot of compensation to the victim. At Sunny’s creatures, PaRappa and Joe Chin clashed with each other and destroyed Sunny’s cake on this special day. Since those events, PaRappa wanted herself to be better to attract
Sunny’s attention. He met an old teacher, PaRappa began to learn about music through his former teacher. A song created by PaRappa successfully captured Sunny’s interest and the two became a couple.

title: Resident Evil (Bio Hazard)
description: After a series of strange and mysterious murders on the outskirts of Raccoon City. The Raccoon City Police Department has assigned the Bravo Team to this area to investigate the cause of recent deaths. Subsequently, the police department lost contact with the Bravo Team. Alpha Team has also been sent to investigate the mysterious disappearance and complete the task of this task force. After locating the position the signal appears for the last time of the Bravo Team. They landed their helicopter at this location. After landing, they were suddenly attacked by a group of monstrous dogs and a member of the Alpha Team was killed. Frightened by this incident, the pilot Brad Vicker took off the helicopter alone. He abandoned the rest of the team including Chris Redfield, Jill Valentine, Albert Wesker, and Barry Burton. The rest of the members were forced to flee into an abandoned mansion nearby near the dogs’ aggression. While in the mansion, the members of the group decided to separate to investigate. In the game, players can meet some members of the Bravo Team. They provide players with useful information to help you complete the task more easily. Players will discover a series of experiments being carried out by a team of scientists owned by the Umbrella Corporation. They are working on a virus that mutates living organisms called T-viruses.

title: Resident Evil 2 (Biohazard 2)
description: Raccoon City is one of the most developed cities in the United States. The Umbrella Corporation has helped the city become more developed with a series of large research centers. An incident happened on September 29, 1998, T-virus was released by Umbrella in the water. This virus creates a dangerous disease and turns people into bloodthirsty zombies. Leon S. Kennedy met Claire Redfield when she was looking for her brother in this city. The two must find a way out of Raccoon City through police headquarters and underground sewers. After a series of dangers from Zombie and Tyrant, they discovered the appearance of G-virus. Ada Wong is a spy, she is responsible for collecting G-viruses for secret organizations. Overcoming a series of areas in the city, Leon S. Kennedy and Claire Redfield encountered the reality of containing the G-virus, the two destroy it and escape the city. Ada Wong completes the mission to collect this dangerous virus and return to the secret organization.

title: Resident Evil 2: Dual Shock (BioHazard 2 – Dual Shock )
Resident Evil 3 : Nemesis (Biohazard 3 – Last Escape)
description:
Story of Resident Evil 3: Nemesis takes place 24 hours before the story of its predecessor. In the Raccoon City police headquarters, Jill Valentine, a member of STAR, fled from the city when the disease broke out. During this time, the city was flooded with zombies due to the T-virus. Upon arriving at the police station, Jill Valentine saw Brad Vickers killed by a mysterious monster. This monster is called Nemesis made by Umbrella to destroy all members of the STAR group. Not an ordinary monster, Nemesis had intelligence and they were programmed to destroy targets anywhere on earth. At this time, Jill Valentine will face a great danger from all sides. The player’s mission is to help her escape from this cursed city.
While fleeing from the rampaging monster, Jill met three members of the UBCS team, Nikolai Zinoviev, Carlos Oliveira and Mikhail Victor. The three people who showed Jill how to escape the city were to use a radio device to contact the rescue team to the city’s clock tower. After a series of difficulties crossing the area, Nikolai mysteriously disappeared and was thought to be killed by Nemesis. The rest of the group fled for hours to escape Nemesis’ pursuit. Upon reaching the clock tower and meeting the helicopter, everyone thought that everything would end here. Nemesis appears and destroys the party’s hopes by destroying the helicopter. After escaping from the clock tower and Nemesis’ pursuit again, Jill became infected with the T-virus and lost consciousness on the street. Carlos was the one who found Jill and took her to the hospital to get an anti-T-virus vaccine. Over the next several days, Jill regained consciousness and met Nicolai at the park. He reveals to her a secret of Umbrella, some of Umbrella’s supervisors being sent to the city. These supervisors are monsters created by the Umbrella Corporation to kill the survivors. Leaving the park and continuing the journey, Jill encountered a giant worm and destroyed it. When fleeing to a chemical factory, she met Carlos again, he informed her that the government would use nuclear weapons to fight off the T-virus epidemic. In the end, Jill found a new plane and escaped Raccoon City before the nuclear missile arrived.
Unlike in the previous version, players will need to choose a journey for Jill. All the details of the game are linked, you will probably not see Nicolai again and things will become more difficult. This is also a new feature of Resident Evil that is greatly appreciated by many players. It brings a lot of different plot directions and creates a new experience every time you replay the game.

The battles were tense until most of the monsters were defeated. With the ability to fight resilient, the help of other forces along with weapons of destructive power, players destroy all monsters and complete their mission and bring peaceful life to the citizen.

title: Silent Hill
description: Silent Hill is a horror-type game produced in 1999. The story begins when Harry Mason drives with Cheryl to a famous town for a vacation. On the way, he had an accident and crashed into a big tree while avoiding a passerby. After calming down, he realized that his daughter had disappeared, and Harry Mason had to roam the town in search of her. During his journey, he met many of the characters who brought the town’s mysteries like Cybil Bennett, Dahlia Gillespie, and Dr. Michael Kaufmann. The story became serious when Harry Mason discovered an insane nurse named Lisa Garland, who began to guess what he was about to face. After discovering a few more mysteries, Harry believes that the town is cursed by a dark force that makes the people of this place disappear continuously. His daughter is one of them. Continuing his quest, Harry is increasingly discovering more and more mysteries and stories of the characters. He learned that his daughter Cheryl was caught up in a struggle for power by those who wanted to revive the gods.

title: Spider-Man 2 – Enter – Electro
description: Spider-Man is an RPG game and adapted from the movie of the same name. The game is about Peter Parker, an orphan boy living in New York City with Ben Parker and May Parker. After a major incident, Peter Parker gained the ability to be like a spider. He can cling to any terrain such as ceilings, walls and even under the cars. In addition, Peter Parker’s physical superiority compared to ordinary people. After that, he asked a famous scientist to create clothes for himself. With new clothes and the power of a spider, Peter Parker fulfilled his dream of becoming a hero to save innocent people from the conspiracy of the evil forces. In this version, Peter Parker will have to overcome many different levels. The player will help him defeat bad guys to protect the city.

title: Tarzan
description:
In this adaptation of Walt Disney's animated film of the same name, Disney's Tarzan for the PlayStation swings into action with 13 levels set within a dangerous jungle. While the graphics are in 3D, play involves moving from left to right to find the exit, similar to that of a 2D platform game. Levels begin with animated film clips, each telling part of the story as Tarzan grows from a young boy to a man.

The jungle is filled with dangerous animals that will diminish Tarzan's health (represented by a vine) every time he makes contact with them. Among the animals you'll encounter are frogs, baboons, rhinos, alligators, coconut-dropping birds and even enemy hunters. Of course, not all the animals are there to hurt you. Your friend, a female gorilla named Terk, will offer some tips along the way, and Tantor the elephant can also help out during certain stages.

Moves include swinging from vine to vine, climbing trees or ledges, jumping over enemies and pounding the ground. The latter technique is useful for revealing hidden power-ups or breaking certain structures so you can continue onward. Tarzan can also throw an unlimited number of fruit at the animals, as well as use a knife and spear (once found).

Besides making his way through the jungle, Tarzan can collect items to help him succeed. These include Tarzan coins (an extra life is earned for every 100 coins collected); letters to spell T-A-R-Z-A-N, which will let you watch opening movies from the option screen; four pieces of a sketch to open up a bonus round; and three different pieces of fruit to increase attack power. Bananas are also available to replenish lost health.

Fans of the animated film will experience levels that closely follow its story, from trying to outrun stampeding elephants to saving Tarzan's gorilla family from the evil hunter Clayton. Players will also be able to slide down a jungle vine at high speeds from a perspective behind Tarzan!

Battle the leopard Sabor and meet up with Professor Porter and his daughter Jane as you strive to become lord of the jungle. A memory card with one block free is required to save progress, but players can revisit past levels to hunt down every artifact. Complete the game with a 100% rating to unlock a special secret!

  Manufacturer's description:

Disney's animated film TARZAN gets the video game treatment and makes his way to the PlayStation. The game follows the plot of the movie: you must help Tarzan grow from a boy to an adult in the span of 14 levels of action. While many of the levels offer platform-jumping, vine-swinging fun, some of them recreate some of the action sequences from the movie. No matter where he is, Tarzan must collect the tokens and fruit that are scattered about. Collecting 100 tokens earns an extra life, and the fruit can be used to dispose of enemies. If you can collect the four pieces of Jane's baboon drawing, you can earn the chance to play a bonus level. You've got to help the young ape-man discover his place in the world with TARZAN.

description:
Xenogears is an immersive action game released in 1998 by Square for PlayStation. The game is about a fictional character named Fei Fong Wong and his friends. They travel the world to uncover the mysteries and overthrow the rule of the evil almighty Solaris. When Fei Fong Wong was young, he was robbed by a mysterious masked man and placed Fei Fong Wong in a small village called Lahan. Under the circumstances of the peaceful Lahan village being attacked, Fei Fong Wong and the villagers had to stand up to fight. He used a device to fight the enemy. Unable to control his power, he accidentally destroyed the entire village. Later, Fei Fong Wong met an officer named Elly. He says he is the one who knows about Fei Fong Wong’s past and is also the commander of the attack on the village of Lahan to unlock his hidden power. While an unknown red device is attacking Bart and Citan, Fei Fong Wong loses control of his device again. After waking up, he is locked up in Kislev Prison. Thanks to the help of new friends including the prisoners of Kislev Prison. However, he and Elly are separated from the group and were shot by Bart with a gun. In the end, they were rescued and arrived in a famous city, Thames.
After a number of incidents, Fei Fong Wong gradually learns the secrets about himself and his mission to destroy Solaris.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! – Forbidden Memories
description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! is a very famous Japanese comic book, it has been adapted into many different movies and games. Players will not be able to ignore Yu-Gi-Oh! Forbidden Memories with unique and addictive gameplay. It is also one of Yu-Gi-Oh’s most successful games! The series has been released. Every event of the game will involve Prince Atem of Egypt in ancient times. Each event will be a card battle and the player needs to defeat the opponent to continue the game story. Atem sneaked out of the royal palace and met his friends Teana and Jono. They went to a ceremony for magicians to experience magic. After the ceremony, Atem challenged a card battle against a priest named Seto. With the good fighting ability and reasonable tactics, Atem defeated Seto quickly. A major incident occurred when Atem returned to the palace after the battle. Heishin priest used magic to threaten Atem by killing the king and queen. What Heishin wants from Atem is the millennium riddle, which is the greatest secret of ancient Egypt. Next, Muran appeared to control Heishin and told Atem to destroy the puzzle. After the puzzle was destroyed, Muran locked Atem’s soul into it and waited for a future person to reassemble the puzzle.
The next stage of the game is 5000 years later, Yugi Moto is the protagonist of the game that brings together the fragments of the ancient puzzle and completes it. At that time, Atem appeared and gave Yugi Moto 6 blank cards. To uncover the mystery of the empty cards, players need to take part in card battles to unlock new features of the cards. Players will have to win a minimum of 6 different matches to unlock these cards and perfect the power of the ancient puzzle. Atem will be revived and return to 5000 years ago to meet Muran again. A new mission has been set, Atem will have to use the cards to collect items from the magicians who are protecting the royal family. After a series of major events, players will collect a full range of items and summon DarkNite – an ancient force. However, DarkNite does not accept to help Atem and turn him into a card. What DarkNite desires is to possess the power of the millennium riddle, Atem has shown DarkNite this item. DarkNite challenges Atem in a balanced battle and is defeated twice. In the end, DarkNite had to return to nowhere, where he was born.
